attributes.action: allow second homes for MP's,but once they have stopped being MP's,the homes revert back to the government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow MP's to buy second homes,and keep records of all their out of pocket expenses,then, when the MP retires and does not need the second home near Parliament,the property should revert back to the Government of the day,so they can sell the property less, the out of pocket expenses returned to the previous owner.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
